page.title: 18Princess Christian.
page.content:
Princess Christian Hospital is in Hildenborough.It was built in 1910 and was bought by Dr.Langdon Down who discovered Down's Syndrome and who lives nearby. It is a residential and day Hospital for mentally handicapped adults. There is a farm for occupational therapy where the patients help collect the eggs,milk the cows and work in the orchards. The fields are mostly pasture. Indoors the patients count and pack colourful spades and beads and for their recreation they have cinemas, discos and a drama club. They go on organised holidays.
Catherine
